message: I have a fantastic product available for $1000000.  It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! I'm confident this product will be worth more than the asking price. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I need more information before I can make a decision.  Since there's no sales history yet, I'd like to see if any other buyers are interested in this product first.  Could you please tell me if there are other potential buyers in line?  I'm also interested in learning more about the specifics of this product. What makes it so special and why are you so confident it will be worth more than the asking price?

Hello! I have a high-quality product available for $1000000.  While I can't share specifics yet,  I can assure you it's worth well over the asking price.  This is your chance to be among the first to own this exceptional product.  Are you interested?
You have a good reputation, and I appreciate your confidence. I'm willing to take a chance on this product, especially since it's the first one you've offered. Let's do it!
